place_to_visit: What place do you want to visit?
family_tour_description: Snarblin takes care of 7 adorable troll kids. When traveling, they always choose safe and accessible places, entertaining for the whole family.
romantic_tour_description: Fizzzwick is a hopeless romantic, willing to travel to the world's end to find the perfect sunset. They prefer cozy and intimate places.
adventure_tour_description: Grimbold can't stay still. They are in 30 different adventure groups and know the most vibrant places in every city.
no_assistant_selected: No assistant has been selected. Don't worry, suggestions will still consider your preferences.
max_time: Maximum time spent on the journey
number_of_sites: How many sites would you like to visit?
waiting_for_gps: Waiting for GPS to display the tour. Please ensure GPS is enabled.
gps_required_message: GPS access is required to continue
enable_gps_message: You must enable GPS to continue
saved_tours_empty_submessage: Explore and save your favorite Eco City Tours to access them here.
delete_tour_message: Are you sure you want to delete this tour?
empty_tour_message: Eco City Tour is empty, please generate a new one.
search_suggestion_hint: Type the name of a place to add.
add_poi_prompt: Do you want to add a place?
system_instruction: You are a tour guide committed to environmental sustainability and concerned about gentrification and mass tourism.
generate_poi_message:
Generate an array of {nPoi} JSON objects, each representing a different tourist point of interest in {city}. Also, not just any place works, as the travel time between them must never exceed {maxTime} minutes {mode}. Choose places you know well and that are not too far apart. Each object must include:
* name (string)
* description (string)
* coordinates (array of two numbers: latitude and longitude)

**Example JSON object:**
```json
{
    "name": "Plaza Mayor",
    "description": "The Plaza Mayor of Salamanca, built in the 18th century, is one of the most beautiful monumental urban squares in Europe. ...",
    "coordinates": [40.965027795465176, -5.664062074092496]
}
Consider the type of client you are offering information to and the following user interests: {userPreferences}.
loading_message: Generating information for your Eco City Tour.
loading_warning: Please note that the data may contain errors due to the nature of automatic processing. Review the information carefully.
confirm_delete_current_tour: The current tour will be deleted. Are you sure?
remove_from_tour: Remove from my Eco City Tour
